item.title: At the close end of Martens Close, the last hour has claimed the turning corner as their property. The kerb has been dropped for as many as 3 cars to enter the paved front garden. Tge owner came out to tell me I couldnâ€™t turn and stop there as the area is his! This cannot be right. This is a public road with rights to turn as well as rules on when allowed to park after single yellow line allowed parking times., 20th August
item.description:
This is a public road, with permitted turning and time specific allowed parking rights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martens Close, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load (Estates)

item.title: Abandoned horse box on willow road for over 3 years, 20th August
item.description:
As previously mentioned ...... Horse box on willow road Sent to London Borough of Bexley less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 7922218 Been on road ....unmoved for over 3 years !! Despite reporting numerous times (latest above on 25th July 2025) ......case seems to be continuously closed down without any updates or reason as to why this is not being looked into . Why on earth is a council allowing an untaxed /abandoned horse box to be left on Willow road .....when this box is clearly being used as storage and is unlocked posing a fire hazard ...and taking up the space of at least one large car on a road that is already suffering with over parking due to the proximity to the station !!! Please please get this moved .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet
